title: Castiel
description: In the second book of GBTBR, David finds his way through life after losing his sister. Meeting new people along the way and touching lives like he never imagined. Can he continue on the right path and change peoples lives forever or will the loss of his sister still haunt him? David has now moved to a new state looking for a fresh start and a new outlook on life. While working as a crisis counselor, David finds himself drawn to a man on the other end of the phone who is thinking about taking his own life. Can David save him before it's too late?
author: Crystal Cattabriga
